channel.title: Portfolios on portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Portfolios on portfolio

item.title: Mutual Fund Analysis
item.description: This is a end to end project, Scarpping the data from official website of Mutual Fund house, cleaning the data, applying automation , because it is impossible to clean each sheets (300000 excel sheets approx) of one fund house. I designed a toolkit containing different types of templates to extract and clean the data, since the data is too big, SQL database is used to store the raw data. client interest was to know how much money, each mutual fund is investing in a stock market.

item.title: Sentiment Analysis
item.description: Sentiment Analysis is a type of Natural Language processing problem that determines the sentiment or emotion of a piece of text, an algorithm is designed to classify whether a products review was negative , positive , or netural. There are many different applications of NLP. These includes language translation, text generation and spell/grammer check. For this project I build a Recursive Neural network to classify the sentiments of tweets about the product.

item.title: Text Classification
item.description: Using Bayes Theorem to built a high accuracy Text Classification which claassify over 25000, newspaper article into 20 categories.

item.title: Instagram Bot
item.description: The project is based on a scenario that my client has opened a new food blogging handle on Instagram and he wants to get famous. He wants to follow a lot of people so that he can get noticed quickly but it is a tedious task so, using a selenium and beautiful soup I built a bot which can search send them follow/unfollow requet, like/unlike all the posts on the page, scrap the list of followers, check their instagram reels and stories.
